<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset extends on the GHS population dataset. The original depicts number of inhabitats per pixel in 1975, 1990, 2000, and 2015. Here, we linearly interpolated this data on a yearly basis, deriving global population counts between 1992 and 2018.
</p>
